juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AlmondTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AlmondTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AlmondTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Almond tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Almond.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Almond
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Almond.Description: A drupe consisting of an outer hull and a hard shell with the seed within.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPearTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPearTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPearTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Asian Pear tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPear.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPear
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AsianPear.Description: Not to be confused with the normal pear.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AvocadoTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AvocadoTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_AvocadoTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Avocado tree. Ready to harvest in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Avocado.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Avocado
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Avocado.Description: A soft plant that is a popular topping and addition to many meals.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_BreadfruitTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_BreadfruitTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_BreadfruitTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Breadfruit tree. Bears fruit in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Breadfruit.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Breadfruit
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Breadfruit.Description: A relative of the jackfruit. It has a robust flavor that is surprisingly fruity and sweet.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Camphor tree. Ready to harvest in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorLeaves.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorLeaves
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CamphorLeaves.Description: Glossy oval leaves that are very fragrant when crushed.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CashewTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CashewTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CashewTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cashew tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Cashew.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Cashew
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Cashew.Description: A buttery nut that buds at the bottom of the cashew apple.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cinnamon tree. Ready to harvest in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonSticks.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonSticks
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CinnamonSticks.Description: Its scent is uniquely warming, uplifting, and stimulating, and its flavor sweet and delicious.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cocoa tree. Bears fruit in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaPod.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaPod
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CocoaPod.Description: The pod obtained from a cocoa tree. Mmm! Who's ready to make some chocolate?

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CoconutTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CoconutTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CoconutTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Coconut tree. Ready to harvest in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CrystalFruitTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CrystalFruitTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_CrystalFruitTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Crystal Fruit tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruitTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruitTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruitTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Dragon Fruit tree. Bears fruit in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruit.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruit
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DragonFruit.Description: Also called a pitaya, this is the fruit of a large cactus.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DurianTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DurianTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_DurianTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Durian tree. Ready to harvest in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Durian.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Durian
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Durian.Description: A smelly fruit with a spiky husk.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Eucalyptus tree. Ready to harvest in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusLeaves.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusLeaves
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_EucalyptusLeaves.Description: Leathery blue-green leaves are studded with glands containing a fragrant, volatile oil. Luckily not an exploding oil!

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FigTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FigTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FigTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Fig tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Fig.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Fig
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Fig.Description: A small and sweet fruit. It is soft and delicious.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteriaT.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteriaTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteriaT.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Wisteria tree. Blossoms in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteria.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteria
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_FragrantWisteria.Description: An especially fragrant cluster of purple flowers.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenCoconutTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenCoconutTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenCoconutTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Golden Coconut tree. Ready to harvest in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenWalnutTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenWalnutTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GoldenWalnutTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Golden Walnut tree. Ready to harvest in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithAppleT.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithAppleTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithAppleT.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Granny Smith tree. Bears fruit in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithApple.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithApple
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrannySmithApple.Description: The flavor is tart and acidic, but it makes for a good baking apple.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrapefruitTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrapefruitTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_GrapefruitTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Grapefruit tree. Bears fruit in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Grapefruit.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Grapefruit
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Grapefruit.Description: A large bitter fruit, high in Vitamin C. Are you a salty or sugary kind of person?

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HazelnutTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HazelnutTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HazelnutTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Hazelnut tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HollyTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HollyTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_HollyTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Holly tree. Ready to harvest in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LemonTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LemonTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LemonTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Lemon tree. Bears fruit in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lemon.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lemon
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lemon.Description: A tangy citrus fruit that is used to make lemonade.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LimeTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LimeTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LimeTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Lime tree. Bears fruit in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lime.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lime
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lime.Description: The tarter cousin of the lemon. It is often used as an accent to numerous dishes.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LycheeTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LycheeTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_LycheeTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Lychee tree. Bears fruit in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lychee.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lychee
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Lychee.Description: The outside is roughly textured and inedible, but the inside is sweet.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Melaleuca tree. Ready to harvest in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaLeaves.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaLeaves
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_MelaleucaLeaves.Description: A prickly cone of leaves that are often used as a homemade remedy for cuts and bruises.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_OliveTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_OliveTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_OliveTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Olive tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Olive.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Olive
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Olive.Description: It is packed with vitamins! Olives are used to make oil and salads.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PapayaTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PapayaTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PapayaTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Papaya tree. Bears fruit in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Papaya.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Papaya
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Papaya.Description: A tropical fruit from the rainforest. It has a sweet flavor and a lot of natural juiciness.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PearTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PearTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PearTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pear tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pear.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pear
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pear.Description: A mildly sweet fruit that grows in the winter. Let it ripen for a few days before eating.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PecanTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PecanTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PecanTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pecan tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pecan.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pecan
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pecan.Description: A savory nut with a striped seed. Do you own a nutcracker?

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PersimmonTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PersimmonTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PersimmonTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Persimmon tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Persimmon.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Persimmon
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Persimmon.Description: A somewhat uncommon fruit filled with a honey-like flavor.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PomeloTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PomeloTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_PomeloTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomelo tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pomelo.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pomelo
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Pomelo.Description: A really large, not so bitter, cousin of the grapefruit.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_QiGemTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_QiGemTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_QiGemTree.Description: Some things transcend time and space, kid. Plant this somewhere far and warm.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_SpiceBerryTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_SpiceBerryTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_SpiceBerryTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Spice Berry tree. Bears fruit in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_UmeTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_UmeTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_UmeTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Ume tree. Bears fruit in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Ume.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Ume
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Ume.Description: A sweet and sour green fruit. It is usually preserved with sugar or salt.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_VanillaTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_VanillaTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_VanillaTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Vanilla tree. Ready to harvest in the spring.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Vanilla.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Vanilla
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Vanilla.Description: Easily be one of the most well-known flavors in the world. Who's hungry for ice cream?

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WalnutTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WalnutTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WalnutTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Walnut tree. Ready to harvest in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Walnut.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Walnut
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Walnut.Description: A nut that makes delicious candies and pies. It is often used in the filling of sweet treats.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WildPlumTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WildPlumTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_WildPlumTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Wild Plum tree. Bears fruit in the fall.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlangTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlangTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlangTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Ylang Ylang tree. Blossoms in the summer.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlang.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlang
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YlangYlang.Description: A highly appreciated flower in perfumery and aromatherapy.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YuzuTree.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YuzuTree
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_YuzuTree.Description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Yuzu tree. Bears fruit in the winter.

juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Yuzu.Name: juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Yuzu
juminos.MoreFruitTrees_Yuzu.Description: An aromatic citrus fruit that is usually preserved with sugar.
